extDescr.message: Shows films and series rating from IMDB and Kinopoisk on FS.UA and EX.UA. Allows to vote in both systems in place.

playerOnly.message: Remove all unnecessary content from Video player page.

playerOnlySub.message: Only player window and season/video quality/audio stream selectors.

syncSettingsSub.message: All browsers with same account will use same settings.

showVotingSub.message: Helps you to vote in both systems in one place.
